name: Night of Blood
description:
"Night of Blood" is an adventure /mystery/horror game where you play as a school student who loves to help his friends, but one night it's different.

Features:

Multiple ending

40-50min of game

Shooting

Puzzle

Murder mystery

Content warning: 

This game has themes of blood, murder, violence and torture. Please only play this game if these themes do not deeply upset you.

This game has been developed for Windows and intended for ages 17 and up.

For content creators: 

You are free to record/stream and share content about the downloaded standard windows version of this game.

Credits: Arvind Swain, TheOdie, Sanjay Apat, Sujit Swain, Rajkishore Mahapatra, Sanu
